rule.name: DS_SendTask
rule.description: Interface to send an ad-hoc task from a record.
rule.definition: =#"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_formLayout"( label: if( isnull(ri!recordId), "Send Task", "Send Task from " & #"6ba807e2-12a4-4903-8adb-653e8be66134_GETONERECORD"(ri!recordId).description ), instructions: "Details of this record will be embedded in the task form.", firstColumnContents: { #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_pickerFieldUsers"( label: "Assignee", instructions: if( or( isnull(ri!assignee), isusermemberofgroup(ri!assignee, #"_a-0000dceb-fa5d-8000-aae2-01ef9001ef90_4355") ), "", "This user is not in the Collaborators group. If you send a task to them, they will be given access to this application." ), maxSelections: 1, value: ri!assignee, saveInto: ri!assignee, required: true ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_paragraphField"( label: "Task Description", labelPosition: "ABOVE", validations: if(len(ri!taskDetails)>4000, "Message may not be longer than 4000 characters. You have entered " & len(ri!taskDetails) & " characters.", ""), value: ri!taskDetails, saveInto: ri!taskDetails, required: true ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_dateTimeField"( label: "Deadline", value: ri!deadline, saveInto: ri!deadline, validations: if( ri!deadline < now(), "Deadlines must be in the future", "" ) ) }, buttons: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_ButtonLayout"( primaryButtons: { #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_ButtonWidgetSubmit"( label: "Send Task", style: "PRIMARY", confirmMessage: if( or( isnull(ri!assignee), isusermemberofgroup(ri!assignee, #"_a-0000dceb-fa5d-8000-aae2-01ef9001ef90_4355") ), "", "Are you sure you want to send a task to this user? They will receive access to all functionality in the Department Sales application." ), saveInto: { a!save(ri!taskedOn, now()), a!save(ri!taskFrom, loggedinuser()) } ) }, secondaryButtons: { #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_ButtonWidgetSubmit"( label: "Cancel", style: "NORMAL", value: true, saveInto: ri!cancel, skipValidation: true ) } ) )
